name: TzuChiJingSiAphorisms
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jing si
des: Mention the words 'Jing Si' and you will get an aphorism read to you. Hope you get inspired with the wise words spoken by Venerable Master Shih Cheng Yen. A collection of free Tzu Chi Jing Si aphorism.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
